# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a transition layout object from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Initializing the transition layout object

- **init(currentLayout:nextLayout:)**: Initializes and returns a transition layout object.
